And Sonic Notify Begins

January 23, 2012 . . Comments
Tags: news

Tweet

Sonic Notify began with beacons that Alex Bell created originally for crowd-sourced tracking of NYC MTA buses. in a meeting with 2 of Densebrain’s largest clients, Olay and Lways the desire to differentate in aisle was clearly communicated to our team. Â At that moment Sonic Notify was born.

With initial tracking at Procter and Gamble, I, Jonathan Glanz decided to make a significant investment in the company of 300k on October 1st, 2011.
